info.name: CRM Healthcare API
info.description: API collection untuk CRM Healthcare/Pharmaceutical Platform - Sales CRM

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Login dengan email dan password. Response akan menyertakan JWT token dan refresh token.
Refresh access token menggunakan refresh token.

item.description: Endpoints untuk authentication dan authorization

item.name: Web
Master Data
User Management

request.description: Get list of users with pagination
Get user permissions in hierarchical menu structure
Get complete user profile with stats, activities, transactions, and connections

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Change user password. Requires current password verification.

item.description: User Management endpoints untuk mengelola users, roles, dan permissions

item.name: Account Management

request.description: Get list of accounts with pagination

item.description: Account Management endpoints untuk mengelola accounts (Hospitals, Clinics, Pharmacies)

item.name: Categories
item.description: Category Management endpoints untuk mengelola account categories (Hospital, Clinic, Pharmacy)

item.name: Contact Roles

request.description: Get list of all contact roles
Get contact role details by ID

item.description: Contact Role Management endpoints untuk mengelola contact roles (Doctor, PIC, Manager, Other)

item.name: Contact Management

request.description: Get list of contacts with pagination

body.raw:
{
  "account_id": "account_id_here",
  "name": "Dr. John Doe",
  "role_id": "contact_role_id_here",
  "phone": "081234567890",
  "email": "doctor@example.com",
  "position": "Chief Medical Officer",
  "notes": "Primary contact for medical supplies"
}

item.description: Contact Management endpoints untuk mengelola contacts (Doctors, PICs, Managers)

item.name: Sales Pipeline Management
Pipeline Stages

request.description: Get list of all pipeline stages

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "stage_abc123",
      "name": "Lead",
      "code": "lead",
      "order": 1,
      "color": "#94A3B8",
      "is_active": true,
      "is_won": false,
      "is_lost": false,
      "description": "New lead that needs qualification",
      "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
      "updated_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "stage_def456",
      "name": "Qualification",
      "code": "qualification",
      "order": 2,
      "color": "#3B82F6",
      "is_active": true,
      "is_won": false,
      "is_lost": false,
      "description": "Qualifying the lead to determine if it's a good fit",
      "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
      "updated_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "filters": {
      "is_active": true
    }
  },
  "timestamp": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
  "request_id": "req_abc123xyz"
}

request.description: Get pipeline stage details by ID
Get pipeline summary statistics (total deals, won/lost/open deals, value by stage)
Get forecast data for deals (expected revenue, weighted revenue)

body.raw:
{
  "name": "New Stage",
  "code": "new_stage",
  "order": 7,
  "color": "#8B5CF6",
  "is_active": true,
  "is_won": false,
  "is_lost": false,
  "description": "New pipeline stage"
}

request.description: Update the order of multiple pipeline stages

item.description: Pipeline Stages endpoints untuk mengelola pipeline stages (Lead, Qualification, Proposal, Negotiation, Closed Won, Closed Lost)

item.name: Deals

request.description: Get list of deals with pagination and filters

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "deal_abc123",
      "title": "New Deal Opportunity",
      "description": "Deal description here",
      "account_id": "account_xyz789",
      "account": {
        "id": "account_xyz789",
        "name": "Rumah Sakit Umum"
      },
      "contact_id": "contact_def456",
      "contact": {
        "id": "contact_def456",
        "name": "Dr. John Doe",
        "email": "doctor@example.com",
        "phone": "081234567890"
      },
      "stage_id": "stage_abc123",
      "stage": {
        "id": "stage_abc123",
        "name": "Lead",
        "code": "lead",
        "order": 1,
        "color": "#94A3B8",
        "is_active": true,
        "is_won": false,
        "is_lost": false
      },
      "value": 50000000,
      "value_formatted": "Rp 500.000",
      "probability": 50,
      "expected_close_date": "2024-12-31T00:00:00+07:00",
      "actual_close_date": null,
      "assigned_to": "user_789",
      "assigned_user": {
        "id": "user_789",
        "name": "Sales Rep Name",
        "email": "sales@example.com"
      },
      "status": "open",
      "source": "website",
      "notes": "Additional notes",
      "created_by": "user_789",
      "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
      "updated_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "pagination": {
      "page": 1,
      "per_page": 20,
      "total": 150,
      "total_pages": 8,
      "has_next": true,
      "has_prev": false,
      "next_page": 2,
      "prev_page": null
    },
    "filters": {}
  },
  "timestamp": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
  "request_id": "req_abc123xyz"
}

request.description: Create a new deal. Value is in smallest currency unit (sen). Probability is 0-100 percentage.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "deal_abc123",
    "title": "New Deal Opportunity",
    "description": "Deal description here",

      "phone": "081234567890"
    },
    "stage_id": "stage_abc123",
    "stage": {
      "id": "stage_abc123",
      "name": "Lead",
      "code": "lead",
      "order": 1,
      "color": "#94A3B8",
      "is_active": true,
      "is_won": false,
      "is_lost": false
    },
    "value": 50000000,
    "value_formatted": "Rp 500.000",
    "probability": 50,
    "expected_close_date": "2024-12-31T00:00:00+07:00",
    "actual_close_date": null,
    "assigned_to": "user_789",
    "assigned_user": {
      "id": "user_789",
      "name": "Sales Rep Name",
      "email": "sales@example.com"
    },
    "status": "open",
    "source": "website",
    "notes": "Additional notes",
    "created_by": "user_789",
    "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
    "updated_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00"
  },
  "meta": {
    "created_by": "user_789"
  },
  "timestamp": "2024-01-15T10:30:45+07:00",
  "request_id": "req_abc123xyz"
}

request.description: Update deal information. All fields are optional.
Move deal to a different pipeline stage. Status will be automatically updated based on stage (won/lost/open).

item.description: Deals endpoints untuk mengelola sales deals/opportunities
Sales Pipeline Management endpoints untuk mengelola pipeline stages dan deals

item.name: Visit Reports

request.description: Get list of visit reports with pagination
Get visit report details by ID

body.raw:
{
  "account_id": "account_id_here",
  "contact_id": "contact_id_here",
  "visit_date": "2024-01-15",
  "purpose": "Sales visit to discuss new products",
  "notes": "Meeting went well, discussed pricing"
}

request.description: Check in to a visit report with GPS location
Check out from a visit report with GPS location
Reject a visit report with reason (supervisor action)
Upload a photo to a visit report

item.description: Visit Report Management endpoints untuk mengelola visit reports dengan check-in/out, GPS, dan dokumentasi foto

item.name: Dashboard

query.description: Number of top accounts to return
Number of top sales reps to return
Number of recent activities to return

item.description: Dashboard endpoints untuk mendapatkan overview dan statistik dashboard

item.name: Reports

request.description: Get visit report report with statistics
Export visit report report as CSV or Excel file
Export pipeline report as CSV or Excel file
Export sales performance report as CSV or Excel file
Get account activity report for a specific account
Export account activity report as CSV or Excel file

item.description: Report endpoints untuk generate berbagai jenis laporan

item.name: Activities

request.description: Get list of activities with pagination

item.description: Activity Tracking endpoints untuk mengelola activities dan timeline

item.name: Settings

request.description: Get all system settings grouped by category (general, notifications, pipeline)
Update system settings. You can update one or more categories (general, notifications, pipeline). Only provided categories will be updated.

item.description: Settings endpoints untuk mengelola system settings (general, notifications, pipeline)

item.name: Tasks

request.description: Get list of tasks with pagination and filters

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Follow up with client",
  "description": "Call client to discuss proposal",
  "type": "call",
  "priority": "high",
  "due_date": "2024-01-20T10:00:00+07:00",
  "assigned_to": "user_id_here",
  "account_id": "account_id_here",
  "contact_id": "contact_id_here",
  "deal_id": "deal_id_here"
}

request.description: Assign a task to a user
Get list of reminders with pagination
Create a new reminder for a task

item.description: Task & Reminder Management endpoints untuk mengelola tasks dan reminders
Endpoints untuk master data Sales CRM
Endpoints untuk Web Application

item.name: Mobile
Visit Reports

request.description: Get list of visit reports with pagination (Mobile)
Get visit report details by ID (Mobile)

body.raw:
{
  "account_id": "account_id_here",
  "contact_id": "contact_id_here",
  "sales_rep_id": "sales_rep_id_here",
  "visit_date": "2024-01-15",
  "purpose": "Sales visit to discuss new products",
  "notes": "Meeting went well, discussed pricing"
}

request.description: Check in to a visit report with GPS location (Mobile - typically uses device GPS)
Check out from a visit report with GPS location (Mobile - typically uses device GPS)
Upload a photo to a visit report (Mobile - typically uploads from device camera/gallery)

item.description: Visit Report Management endpoints untuk Mobile Application dengan check-in/out, GPS, dan dokumentasi foto
Endpoints untuk Mobile Application

item.name: Health Check

request.description: Health check endpoint untuk memastikan API berjalan.

item.description: Health check endpoints
